amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following: SEC. 3. NO NET LOSS OF JOBS. Section 2 and the amendments made by section 2 shall not take effect unless the Secretary finds that such section and amendments, if in effect, shall not result in a net loss of jobs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to add a section to H.R. 2842 which states that section 2 of the bill and the amendments made by section 2 shall not take effect unless the Secretary finds that such section and amendments, if in effect, shall not result in a net loss of jobs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Ellison.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
